metadata.source: Pandit, Vasant Kumar R., Tikanikayatra of Varahamihira, Journal of the University of Bombay.

children.text: mūrdhnā gaṇeśaṃ ca sarasvatīṃ ca salokapālaṃ parameśvaraṃ ca/
padmodbhavaṃ padmadhanaṃ hariṃ ca trailokyadīpaṃ praṇamāmi bhānum//
āyuṣi ca parijñāte śubham aśubhaṃ vā phalaṃ vācyam//
janmasamayaṃ ca kecid vadanti na vadanti bahuvo 'nye//
janmarkṣodayalagne tad api yayor vā yiyāsataḥ praśne/
śatror horārāśis tad adhipatir janmabhaṃ tadīśo vā//
yady aste hibuke vā tathāpi śatrur hato vācyaḥ//
yadi cādareṇa pṛcchati daivajño nirdiśed vijayam//
nandā bhadrā vijayā riktā pūrṇā ca nāmasadṛśaphalāḥ/
nyūnasameṣṭā daśame tithayaḥ śukle kṛṣṇe pratīpās tāḥ//
pūrveṣu triṣu yāmye pitrye ca vihāya madhyaniśam//
na niśāpaścimabhāge punarvasau triṣu ca vaiṣṇavādyeṣu/
prācyādi sapta sapta kramena dhiṣṇyāni kṛttikādīni/
ājñām iva kuliśabhṛtaḥ patanti na cireṇa te vyasane//
jyeṣṭhā prāgbhādrapadā rohiṇy athottarā ca phalgunyā/
śūlāni prācyādiṣu teṣu gato 'tyeti yadi citram//
saumye 'py anupacayasthe na bhavati yātrā śubhā yātuḥ//E3
garam api kaiś cic chastaṃ vaṇijā(jāṃ) ca vaṇikkriyāsv eva//
ahnaḥ pañcadaśāṃśo rātreś caivaṃ muhūrta iti saṃjñā/
sa ca vijñeyas tajjñaiś chāyāyantrāmbubhir yuktyā//
nakṣatravat kṣaṇānāṃ parighādi tadīśvaraiḥ samaṃ cintyam/
phalam api tad eva dṛṣṭaṃ gargādyais tatra ca ślokāḥ//
yaś cāṣṭamo muhūrto viriñcināmābhijit sa nirdiṣṭaḥ/
aṣṭamena divase same śubho yo viriñcivibhusaṃjñitāḥ(taḥ)(add.kṣaṇaḥ)/
sitapakṣādau candre śubhe śubhaṃ pakṣam aśubham aśubhe ca/
kṛṣṇe gocaraśubhado na śubhaṃ pakṣa(kṣe) śubham atonyat//E3
iṣṭaṃ svajanmalagnaṃ na janmarāśyudgamas tayoḥ sthānāt/
āye janmani rāśiṣu yeṣu śubhā bhāskaradvitīyai//
lagnopagataiḥ saumyair ārogyaṃ bhavati cittasaukhyañ ca/
vāhanasuhṛdāṃ vṛddhiś caturthagaiḥ pañcagaiś ca mantribalam/
karmaṇi siddhir lābho balasampātaś ca daśamādyaiḥ//
krūro 'py anukūlasthaḥ śasto lagne śubho 'pi vāniṣṭaḥ/
vakrī na śubhaḥ kendre tadahas tadvargalagnañ ca//
sūryādibhir anukūlais tad udayavargaiś ca tatsiddhiḥ//
bhujagā iva mantrahatā bhavanty akāryakṣamā lagne//
yeṣāṃ game navamapañcamakaṇṭakasthāḥ saumyās trītīyaripulābhagatāś ca pāpāḥ/
āyānti te svabhavanāni punaḥ kṛtārthāḥ dattā dvijātiṣu tathā vidhivad yathārthāḥ//
ekasminn api kendre yadi saumyo na graho 'sti yātrāyām/
janmany atha vā karmaṇi na tac chubhaṃ prāhur ācāryāḥ//
yāyibhir anukūlasthair yānaṃ paurair vigṛhya cāsīnam/
pauretarair api śubhair yāyād ardhena sainyasya//
sarvair apy aśubhakaraiḥ śubhadaivaṃ saṃśrayet pradhānanṛpam/
balasiddhiḥ saumyaphalair balibhiḥ krūrair jayo yuddhe//E16
udito yato yataś ca bhramaṇe yadvārabheṣu cāragate/
na pratiśukre siddhiṃ svalpo 'py arthaḥ prayāti yātṛṇām/
kāmaṃ vrajet pratibhṛguṃ jijīviṣur nāstage śukre//
kaluṣi vapuṣi grahahate pratilome nīcage 'stage ca bhṛgau/
balasaṃpanno 'pi nṛpo yātā śatror vaśaṃ yāti//
[nakṣatraṃ tithi(tha)yas tathaiva karaṇaṃ vāras tathā gocaraṃ
[ye cānye śakunādayo nigaditāḥ sarve 'pi te śobhanā
[naur iva vikarṇadharā vi(lacuna)(dha)veda vadhūr vibhāskareva dyauḥ/
yo 'pi patir diśi yasyāṃ tasmin tatsthe na tāṃ diśaṃ yāyāt/
hutvānalaṃ namaskṛtya devatāḥ svasti vācya viprāṃś ca/
dhyāyan digīśam avilambitaṃ vrajed bhūpatiḥ sumanāḥ//
kāryavaśāt svayam agamaṃ bhūbhartuḥ kecid āhur ācāryāḥ/
dakṣiṇapārśvaspandanam iṣṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ vihāya pṛṣṭhaṃ ca/
manasaś cāgamaśuddhiḥ ślokaś cāyaṃ munibhir uktaḥ//
ekataś ca mano yāti tad viśuddhaṃ jayāvaham//
ārohati kṣitipatau vinayopapanno yātrānugo 'nyaturagaṃ pratiheṣitaś ca/
vaktreṇa vā spṛśati dakṣiṇam ātmapārśvaṃ yo 'śvaḥ sa bhartur acirāt pracinoti lakṣmīm//
muhurmuhur mūtraśakṛt karoti na tāḍyamāno 'py anulomayāyī/
akāryabhīto 'śruvilocanaś ca śivaṃ na bhartus turago 'bhidhatte//
skhalitagatir akasmāt trastakarṇo 'tidīnaḥ śvasati mṛdu sudīrghaṃ nyastahastaḥ pṛthivyām/
drutamukulitadṛṣṭiḥ svapnaśīlo vikomo bhayakṛd ahitabhakṣī naikaśo 'sṛkśakṛtkṛt//
yāyād yātrānulomaṃ tvaritapadagatir vaktram unnamya coccaiḥ/
tatkālaṃ vā madāptau jayakṛd atha radaṃ veṣṭayan dakṣiṇaṃ ca//
svayam atha racitāny ayatnato vā yadi kathitāni bhavanti maṅgalāni/
sa jayati sakalāṃ tato dharitrīṃ grahaṇadṛgālabhanaśrutair upāsya//
svapneṣv api tāni śubhāśubhāni viḍlepanaṃ dhanyam//
mṛdur anukūlaḥ snigdhapavanaḥ tadvad vīnā(ṇā)ś ca śasyante/
lalāṭaṃ dhanur athendraṃ(nuraindraṃ)na śubhadam anyatra śastaṃ(sta)phalam//
mṛgavihagā śasyante pradakṣiṇaṃ viṣamasaṃkhyayā ca mṛgāḥ/
visrambhahā krodhavaśe(śo) nṛśaṃse(saḥ) kṣudrā(draḥ) pramādī na bahuśrutā(ta)ś ca/
divyāntarikṣakṣitijau(jai)r vikārair nipīḍito (yaś ca) sa daivahīnaḥ//
ato viparyastaguṇena rājñā tādṛgvidho 'ris tv abhiyuktamātraḥ/
tarur ghuṇair jagdha ivāttakāryo mahān api kṣipram upaiti bhaṅgāḥ(ṅgam)//
saṃgrāme va(ya)m amara(dvija)prasādā(t) jyeṣyāmo ripubalam āśv asaṃśayena/
yasye(syai)vaṃ bhavati bale janapravādāḥ(daḥ) svalpo 'pi pravarabalaṃ nihanti rājā//
yuddhasya yātrāsama eva kālaḥ kū(krū)reṣu lagneṣu ca kūṭāyudhaḥ(kūṭayuddhaṃ)//
āgantunāśāya bahirmukhās te tulyaṃ vihaṅgaiḥ saramātmajau(jā)ś ca//
sūryendvoḥ pariveṣakhaṇḍam athavā dṛśyeta yasyāṃ diśi/
sainye vāpi yato viśanti hi tataḥ śatro(troḥ) puraṃ ghātayet//
pātālarkṣe rāhuketvo(tvoḥ) pure 'reto(s to)yocchittiḥ sālapātaś ca kāryaḥ/
jāmitrasthe bhūmijā(je ')syāṃśake vā putreṇendor vīkṣite 'gniḥ pradeyaḥ//
yuddhānte mṛgaśakunaiś ca dīptanādaiḥ no bhadraṃ bhavati jite pari('pi) pārthivasya//
yad anyam a(da)pi vikṛtai(taṃ) na vijayāvasāne bhavet
tadā sukham akaṇṭakaṃ nṛpatir atti deśe ripuḥ(ripoḥ)//E35
